eduDesc: Certificate of Advanced Studies HES-SO in WEB Application Development as Part of Master of Advanced Studies in Rapid  Application Development(MASRAD)
aboutDesc: I am a skilled full-stack developer with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, including modern JavaScript frameworks, PHP frameworks, and database management systems. My experience spans the entire development cycle - from creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces to designing robust server architectures. I have successfully developed and deployed several high-performance applications, hosted on my private VPS server.
contactDesc: I’m currently open to new opportunities and would love to discuss how I can contribute to your team. Feel free to contact me directly via the form below, or through any of the provided channels. I’ll respond promptly!
